name: Gyre and Gimble
description:
Gyre and Gimble, two of Sad Richard's friends, told me they hid a secret password in a poem they like.
"Just take every third word!", they told me.
But I can't remember the name of the poem! I just remember it was full of nonsense.

EDIT: Sorry guys, hyphenated words count as one word.
hint: Remove all spaces and punctuation, make it lowercase, and don't forget the flag format.
